snippet.textDisplay: I find this game quite fascinating, a full RPG with a huge and awesome soundtrack featuring... Miis. It's probably one of those games I will someday decide to randomly play, it looks surprisingly solid. This boss theme is a head bopper, especially when the synth starts at 0:38.
snippet.textOriginal: I find this game quite fascinating, a full RPG with a huge and awesome soundtrack featuring... Miis. It's probably one of those games I will someday decide to randomly play, it looks surprisingly solid. This boss theme is a head bopper, especially when the synth starts at 0:38.

snippet.textDisplay: Have you tried the demo? If not, that might be a good start. It's quite lengthy, too.

snippet.textDisplay: SupraDarky it's very worth a play.  I have it and only gotten to the second half, which it throws you a curve ball.

snippet.textDisplay: It's a lot like Tomodachi life where you watch it a lot more than you play it. So base your decisions off that.
snippet.textOriginal: It's a lot like Tomodachi life where you watch it a lot more than you play it. So base your decisions off that.

snippet.textDisplay: The music throughout Miitopia is really catchy. If you do decide to play it though, DO NOT obsess over 100%ing it as enticing as it might seem at first. This decision will eventually sap you of all desire to play.
snippet.textOriginal: The music throughout Miitopia is really catchy. If you do decide to play it though, DO NOT obsess over 100%ing it as enticing as it might seem at first. This decision will eventually sap you of all desire to play.

snippet.textDisplay:
First time I saw that game I was just like “oh another Mii game..” then I downloaded the demo by curiosity and.. I loved it. It's pretty solid and very fun to say the least. Not perfect but I spent a lot of time on it.
I don't think Nintendo intends to make Miitopia 2 but if they do they' ll get the opportunity to make it even better.
More “exploration” moments like when you control your character in city, the possibility to choose the action of your teammates or even giving each teammates a little quest before recruiting them !
I dunno, I think there's a lot of possibilities to make that already fun game even better !
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay: Its kinda sad a lot of people wrote this off as another "Mii game" Cause ho boy did I really enjoy this game. It has an amazing OST to boot. The World Map music was one of my favorites.

snippet.textDisplay: After Supra reminded us all that this game exists, I began to listen to it’s ost and damn, it’s pretty lit. Whether this game is good though, idk, I have yet to play it. One things for sure though, they better have some remixes of this games soundtrack for Smash Ultimate.
